channel.title: Fpm on purpleidea.com
channel.description: Recent content in Fpm on purpleidea.com

item.title: Making an empty RPM
item.description: I am definitely not an RPM expert, in fact, I’m afraid of it, but with recent tools such as COPR, and my glorious Makefile, some aspects of it have become palatable. This post will be about a recent journey I had building the most useless RPM ever. A video of my journey building this RPM. Because of reasons, I wanted to satisfy an RPM dependency for a package that I wanted to install without rebuilding that RPM.
